name: Co-obligor not discharged when
text:
A judgment against one or more of several obligors, or against one or more of joint, or of joint and several obligors shall not discharge a co-obligor who was not a party to the proceeding wherein the judgment was rendered. [L 1941, c 60, §2; RL 1945, §8742; RL 1955, §192-2; HRS ]
Case Notes
  Cited:  42 H. 111, 115.
